intro.text: You are startled by the appearance of this man. He has blue ruptured skin and a pair of glowing eyes.

response.text: I'm Artyom. You probably should stay away from me, because I'm infected. You should leave this ugly, deformed, dying man alone for his end.

option.title: Appearance
option.text: What made you look like this?

response.text: A month ago, I was caught in the middle of a Visitation. I was working at the farm when it came. It was so fast and I didn't have time to find an underground shelter. So I ducked under the broken roof of the barn house.

It's like a storm of some sort. Sometimes there's weird lightening - you know, in a thunderstorm you see lightening and hear the thunder, right? But you won't hear any thunder in a Visitation. And it shakes everything like baby's rattle. When it comes, you need to hide right away.

option.title: Hide
option.text: Where should I hide when a Visitation comes?

response.text: The safest place is underground. If you can't find it, you can try hiding inside houses, but it'll still hurt you. If you are stuck in the wide-open, you'll end up like me. I'm slowly turning into a ghoul.
Are you here to see me? Could you please spare me some food?

option.title: Food
option.text: Why are you locked up? They are not giving you any food?

response.text: I'm infected and dying. They locked me up for quarantine. But that stingy old man Sidorovich only gave me a pile of potatoes! I don't have much longer to live, I really want to taste some real food before I die. If you have any, I can trade you with money.
